item.title: capitalizing with virtual captive teams
item.description: many organizations are offshoring some of their operations to a third-party vendor for a shorter period in order to minimize the overheads.

item.title: women and work - transitioning towards technology
item.description: in many developing countries, the proportion of working women is very low, and even in developed countries, the figures are not sufficiently high.

item.title: leveraging the lessons learned from covid-19
item.description: at the time of writing covid-19 still remains a pandemic with no demonstrated immunization or effective treatment close by.
